interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Pick & Pick (Gentle/metal allergy free material)
Review Date: 2020/02/29
Store: MIND UP
Average Rating: 3.5
Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '7 x 1.2 x 0.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces'}
Review Text: I was hopeful for this pick but disappointed. First off, it's a super flimsy and you can't use much pressure when pressing against teeth. Also, the pointed end that is supposed to clear put any food from between the teeth isn't pointed enough so you can't really get in there all the way. Last, because you cannot put enough pressure to scrape off gunk, it becomes useless.
Review Title: Way to flimsy
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Growom Garden Hose Nozzle 4 Adjustable Spray Patterns Garden Sprayer Heavy Duty Metal Hose Nozzle with 3 Washers for Gardening, Car Washing, Pet Bathing and General Cleaning
Growom
{'Brand': 'Growom', 'Finish Type': 'Polished', 'Material': 'Heavy,Metal', 'Handle Type': 'Lever', 'Package Dimensions': '8.3 x 4.6 x 1.7 inches; 1.15 Pounds'}
This nozzle is super built to last. It’s rather heavy but I know it will withstand the much abuse. My only worry is we have hard water and sometimes that eats away at our nozzles over time. Great product that will last though!
Super heavy duty
The Beachwaver Co. Dual Voltage, S1, White
{'Product Benefits': 'This ceramic, rotating curling iron provides easy, quality waves in minutes!', 'Shape': 'Barrel', 'Brand': 'The Beachwaver Co.', 'Hair Type': 'All', 'Material': 'Ceramic', 'Product Dimensions': '15.75 x 1.75 x 2 inches; 14.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1', 'UPC': '817741020613', 'Manufacturer': 'AmazonUs/SB10T', 'Country of Origin': 'China'}
First off, I know it pricey for a curling iron but it actually does the trick and is pretty cool. You clip your hair in the bottom little clipper and I prefer the low speed and it winds your hair for you up the wand! It gets nice and hot and curls did stay well after hrs or wear in semi humid weather. Definitely takes a little getting use to but it’s pretty cool. You do need to take slightly smaller sections of hair to curl so the clipper can hold it but I really enjoyed using this!
I was skeptical but this is super amazing
JPNK 4PCS Anti-Static Detangling Fine & Wide Tooth Shower Comb Set
JPNK
{'Material': 'Plastic', 'Brand': 'JPNK', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy,Straight', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '12 x 3.1 x 0.7 inches; 5.61 Ounces'}
I love these combs not only for myself but for my daughters hair. They are perfect for any hair length or texture as you have a set of 4 from wide tooth to fine tooth. They feel nice on the scalp and glide through hair easily. These are a great deal for 4 of these!
Great detangler combs
Magnesium Serum For Kids - All Natural Rub for Kids and Babies, Toxic Free + Free Magnesium Chart PDF
Raise Them Well
{'Brand': 'Raise Them Well', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Unit Count': '2 Fl. Oz', 'Flavor': 'Unflavored', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '4.41 x 1.5 x 1.5 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '853647007044', 'Manufacturer': 'Raise Them Well'}
Unfortunately I didn't notice much different with this spray. I think it smells nice and it a great idea to calm kiddos but I fine essential oil rollers on the bottom of the feet to have more contact with the skin making them more effective.
Didn't notice any difference
Pick & Pick (Gentle/metal allergy free material)
MIND UP
{'Package Dimensions': '7 x 1.2 x 0.5 inches; 0.63 Ounces'}
I was hopeful for this pick but disappointed. First off, it's a super flimsy and you can't use much pressure when pressing against teeth. Also, the pointed end that is supposed to clear put any food from between the teeth isn't pointed enough so you can't really get in there all the way. Last, because you cannot put enough pressure to scrape off gunk, it becomes useless.
Way to flimsy
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference**: Continues to favor heavy-duty, durable gardening tools and accessories, while maintaining a growing interest in beauty and wellness products. Although recent interactions have included items targeted for personal care, there are signs of critical evaluation when the product fails to meet expectations.
- **Material Preference**: Retains a strong inclination toward metal materials in gardening equipment but remains open to high-quality plastics and natural formulations, especially within wellness categories. The latest purchase highlights a critical stance on material performance, especially in terms of durability.
- **Concern for Durability**: Places a high value on longevity and sturdiness across product categories, but new feedback reflects disappointment with products that do not meet these durability criteria, indicating a careful scrutiny of performance.
- **Versatility**: Focuses on multifunctional items that cater to both gardening and broader beauty and wellness needs, though recent experiences suggest a reevaluation of effectiveness and practicality in diverse roles.
- **Overall Satisfaction**: Generally provides positive ratings, but the latest review indicates a shift toward more critical assessments when products do not align with expectations for durability and functionality.
- **Review Behavior**: Actively engages in detailed reviews that balance positive experiences with necessary critiques, particularly when performance in beauty and wellness tools does not meet the user's standards.

This user continues to demonstrate a discerning taste for quality, adaptability in preferences, and a willingness to critically evaluate products across gardening, beauty, and wellness domains.
